title: Black Desert Online
comment: If you like running in circles for hundreds of hours and gambling, then look no further.

title: Cat Quest
comment: A sentimental and wholesome game, it was a fun time to discover hidden easter eggs and treasures.

title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Call of Pripyat
comment: Roleplay as a modern treasure hunter and get eaten by radioactive mutants!

title: Raft
comment: Creative mode is fun and relaxing, and story mode is capitvating.
